dict.acceptation: 呼吸；一口气；呼吸力；微量；

sent.orig: It is attachment that interferes with the in-breath and out-breath of the dance of life.
sent.trans: 就是连接(attachment)，干扰了生命舞蹈的吸入呼出节奏。

sent.orig: Swings in polarity in any creation go from in-breath to out-breath.
sent.trans: 任何创造物中的两极摆动均从吸收到呼出？圈。

sent.orig: Giving and receiving can be likened to-breath and out-breath of God Goddess All That Is.
sent.trans: 给予和接受可以比作万有之源神与女神的呼与吸。

sent.orig: March 3 the third limit, the three main breath hold your breath.
sent.trans: 3月3日第三次涨停，三家主力屏气凝神。

sent.orig: A breath sucked in, then a pause, then wet breath dropped out heavily.
sent.trans: 吸气，停顿，然后无效地沉重地呼气。
